item.title: Quick Install
item.content:encoded: wget -qO - https://codeberg.org/vhs/after-dark/raw/branch/trunk/bin/install | sh Run the above command in a terminal emulator after installing Hugo to start a new website in 5-10 seconds. Hugo version 0.51 or greater required. After Dark includes a portable installation script for quick set-up. Please install Hugo 0.51 or greater before running: Expand to view script 1#!/bin/sh -e 2# 3# Copyright (C) 2019 VHS &lt;vhsdev@tutanota.com&gt; 4# 5# This file is part of After Dark. 6# 7# After Dark is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify 8# it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published 9# by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or 10# (at your option) any later version. 11# 12# After Dark is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, 13# but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of 14# MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the 15# GNU Affero General Public License for more details. 16# 17# You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License 18# along with this program. If not, see &lt;https://www.gnu.org/licenses/&gt;. 19# 20 21validate_hugo () { 22 # Exit with error if hugo is not installed 23 if ! hash hugo 2&gt;/dev/null ; then 24 echo &#34;Error: After Dark requires Hugo version 0.51 or greater&#34; &gt;&amp;2; exit 1 25 fi 26 27 # Exit with error if not minimum required hugo version 28 re=&#34;v(0\d*\.([5-9][1-9]|[6-9])|[1-9]).*&#34; 29 if ! hugo version | grep -qE &#34;$re&#34; ; then 30 echo &#34;Error: After Dark requires Hugo version 0.51 or greater&#34; &gt;&amp;2; exit 1 31 fi 32} 33 34create_site_dir () { 35 SITE_DIR=&#34;flying-toasters&#34; 36 if [ &#34;$1&#34; != &#34;&#34; ] ; then 37 SITE_DIR=&#34;$1&#34; 38 fi 39 40 SITE_DIR_ABS=&#34;$PWD/$SITE_DIR&#34; 41 mkdir -p &#34;$SITE_DIR&#34; 42} 43 44create_site () { 45 echo &#34;Creating a new Hugo site ...&#34; 46 hugo new site &#34;$SITE_DIR&#34; 1&gt;/dev/null 47 cd &#34;$SITE_DIR&#34; || exit 1 48} 49 50download_theme () { 51 echo &#34;Downloading the latest version of After Dark ...&#34; 52 LATEST_META=$(wget -qO - https://registry.npmjs.org/after-dark/latest) 53 vers=$(echo &#34;$LATEST_META&#34; | grep -oE &#34;\&#34;version\&#34;.*[^,]*,&#34; | cut -d &#39;,&#39; -f1 | cut -d &#39;:&#39; -f2 | tr -d &#39;&#34; &#39;) 54 mkdir -p themes/after-dark 55 wget -qO - https://registry.npmjs.org/after-dark/-/after-dark-&#34;$vers&#34;.tgz | tar --strip-components=1 -xz -C themes/after-dark 56 echo &#34;Version $versdownloaded to $SITE_DIR/themes/after-dark&#34; 57} 58 59download_module () { 60 [ -z &#34;$1&#34; ] &amp;&amp; { echo &#34;Error: Attempt to download undefined module&#34; &gt;&amp;2; exit 1; } 61 echo &#34;Downloading $1module for After Dark ...&#34; 62 meta=$(wget -qO - https://registry.npmjs.org/&#34;$1&#34;/latest) 63 vers=$(echo &#34;$meta&#34; | grep -oE &#34;\&#34;version\&#34;.*[^,]*,&#34; | cut -d &#39;,&#39; -f1 | cut -d &#39;:&#39; -f2 | tr -d &#39;&#34; &#39;) 64 mkdir -p themes/&#34;$1&#34; 65 wget -qO - https://registry.npmjs.org/&#34;$1&#34;/-/&#34;$1&#34;-&#34;$vers&#34;.tgz | tar --strip-components=1 -xz -C themes/&#34;$1&#34; 66 echo &#34;Version $versdownloaded to $SITE_DIR/themes/$1&#34; 67} 68 69configure_theme () { 70 echo &#34;Configuring basic After Dark theme settings ...&#34; 71 tee &#34;config.toml&#34; &gt; /dev/null &lt;&lt;TOML 72baseurl = &#34;https://domain.example&#34; # Controls base URL sitewide 73languageCode = &#34;en-US&#34; # Controls site language 74title = &#34;After Dark&#34; # Homepage title and page title suffix 75paginate = 11 # Number of posts to show before paginating 76copyright = &#34;Copyright &amp;copy; Copyright Owner. Licensed under &lt;a target=\&#34;_blank\&#34; rel=\&#34;external noopener license\&#34; href=\&#34;https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/4.0/\&#34;&gt;CC-BY-ND-4.0&lt;/a&gt;.&#34; # Optional, remove to suppress copyright notices 7778# Controls default theme and theme components 79theme = [ 80&#34;fractal-forest&#34;, # OBSD 81&#34;after-dark&#34; # AGPL-3.0-or-later 82] 8384disableLiveReload = false # Optional, set true to disable live reload 85enableRobotsTXT = true # Suggested, enable robots.txt file 86sectionPagesMenu = &#34;main&#34; # Enable menu system for lazy bloggers 8788[markup.goldmark.renderer] 89unsafe = true # Optional, allows HTML inside your CommonMark content 90[markup.tableOfContents] 91startLevel = 1 # Suggested, draws TOC using all heading levels 92endLevel = 6 # Suggested, draws TOC using all heading levels 93[markup.highlight] 94noClasses = false # Suggested, used for custom syntax highlighting 9596[params] 97description = &#34;&#34; # Suggested, controls default description meta 98author = &#34;&#34; # Optional, controls author name display on posts 99hide_author = false # Optional, set true to hide author name on posts 100disable_csp = false # Optional, set true to disable content security policy 101images = [ 102&#34;https://source.unsplash.com/collection/983219/2000x1322&#34; 103] # Suggested, controls default Open Graph images 104105[params.layout.menu.main] 106hidden = true # Optional, set false or remove to show section menu 107108[params.layout.footer] 109hidden = false # Optional, set true to hide footer 110111[params.modules.fractal_forest] 112enabled = true # Optional, set false to disable module 113decoders = [&#34;bpgdec8a&#34;] # Optional, 8-bit javascript decoder with animation 114TOML 115} 116 117update_archetypes () { 118 echo &#34;Updating the default content archetype ...&#34; 119 rm -f archetypes/default.md 120 cp themes/after-dark/archetypes/default.md archetypes 121} 122 123create_welcome_post () { 124 echo &#34;Creating welcome post ...&#34; 125 hugo new post/welcome.md 1&gt;/dev/null 126} 127 128serve_site () { 129 echo &#34;Starting site server ...&#34; 130 hugo serve --buildDrafts --navigateToChanged --port 1313 1&gt;/dev/null &amp; 131} 132 133generate_help_docs () { 134 echo &#34;Generating help documentation ...&#34; 135 THEME_PATH=themes/after-dark 136 meta_path=&#34;$THEME_PATH&#34;/data/npm 137 mkdir -p &#34;$meta_path&#34; &amp;&amp; echo &#34;$LATEST_META&#34; | tr &#39;\r\n&#39; &#39; &#39; &gt; &#34;$meta_path&#34;/latest.json 138 cd &#34;$THEME_PATH&#34;/docs &amp;&amp; mkdir themes &amp;&amp; ln -s ../.. &#34;$THEME_PATH&#34; 139 hugo new validate.md --kind validate 1&gt;/dev/null 140} 141 142serve_help () { 143 echo &#34;Starting help server ...&#34; 144 hugo serve --disableLiveReload --port 1414 1&gt;/dev/null &amp; 145} 146 147echo &#34;Welcome to the After Dark quick installer. Press CTRL-C at any time to abort.&#34; 148 149validate_hugo 150create_site_dir &#34;$1&#34; 151create_site 152download_theme 153update_archetypes 154download_module &#34;fractal-forest&#34; 155configure_theme 156create_welcome_post 157serve_site 158generate_help_docs 159serve_help 160 161YELLOW=&#39;\033[0;33m&#39; 162NC=&#39;\033[0m&#39; 163 164printf &#34;${YELLOW}Installation successful!${NC}\n&#34; 165echo &#34;Site created in $SITE_DIR_ABS&#34; 166echo &#34;Site server started at http://localhost:1313/&#34; 167echo &#34;To stop it run \&#34;kill \$(ps aux | awk &#39;/[h]ugo.*1313/ {print \$2}&#39;)\&#34;.&#34; 168echo &#34;Help server started at http://localhost:1414/&#34; 169echo &#34;To stop and restart it run \&#34;./themes/after-dark/bin/help\&#34;.&#34; 170echo &#34;Thank you for choosing After Dark.&#34; Script has been tested on GNU/Linux, BSD (Darwin) and Windows via Cmder. Warning: Examine scripts downloaded from the Internet before running them. Here are three methods for downloading and running: Download and pipe to sh directly: wget -qO - https://codeberg.org/vhs/after-dark/raw/branch/trunk/bin/install | sh Download into new file, chmod and execute: curl -O https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/after-dark@latest/bin/install &amp;&amp; \ chmod +x install &amp;&amp; ./install From canonical git clone: # clone source and change to source directory git clone https://codeberg.org/vhs/after-dark.git &amp;&amp; cd &#34;$_&#34; # use npm cli to get the release hash echo &#34;${$(npm run integrity)#*sha512-}&#34; # run quick install after validating ./bin/install Script should complete in 5-10 seconds resulting in a sample site and help docs: After Dark Quick Install running to completion in Terminal on Deepin Manjaro. Your new site will be called flying-toasters. Change it to the name of your project anytime you like. Access site by navigating to https://localhost:1313. Multi-site Configuration (Advanced) After Dark enables multi-site management from a single installation. To manage multiple websites use the -c and -d flags to specify the content and destination directories, respectively. For example, to generate an audio site using the current After Dark installation create an executable script to generate the site: flying-toasters/bin/gen-audio-site #!/bin/sh hugo -c sites/audio -d public/static.domain.example Where audio contains the content for that site: ├── layouts ├── sites │ └── audio │ ├── audiobooks │ │ ├── gaining-currency.md │ │ └── the-power-of-now.md │ └── clips │ └── war-of-the-worlds.md ├── static And public contains a folder for each site: public └── static.domain.example ├── categories │ └── index.xml ├── audiobooks │ └── index.html ├── clips │ └── index.html ├── css ├── index.html ├── index.xml ├── js ├── sitemap.xml └── tags └── index.xml And create another script to serve the content for editing: flying-toasters/bin/serve-audio-site #!/bin/sh hugo -c sites/audio Each subdirectory of public then becomes an independent, deployable website and exact copy save for destination content generated. Tip: For additional flexibility type hugo --help and modify your scripts using the --theme and --config flags. Multi-site is perfect for maintaining a consistent look-and-feel across multiple domain origins while limiting the need to run the Upgrade Script for each site.

item.title: Upgrade Script
item.description: To check for updates and automatically upgrade After Dark to the latest version simply run the upgrade script from your site directory: cd flying toasters && \ ./themes/after-dark/bin/upgrade If you’re already using the latest version the script will let you know: Did not upgrade after-dark. Already using latest version. If an update is available the script will download and install it automatically: Starting upgrade from 6.7.6 to 6.8.0 ...
item.content:encoded: To check for updates and automatically upgrade After Dark to the latest version simply run the upgrade script from your site directory: cd flying toasters &amp;&amp; \ ./themes/after-dark/bin/upgrade If you&rsquo;re already using the latest version the script will let you know: Did not upgrade after-dark. Already using latest version. If an update is available the script will download and install it automatically: Starting upgrade from 6.7.6 to 6.8.0 ... Version 6.8.0 downloaded to themes/after-dark Stopping help server if running ... Generating help documentation ... Upgrade complete! Please see CHANGELOG.md for changes. If current version can&rsquo;t be detected the script will prompt you: Cannot detect version. Upgrade after-dark anyway (y/n)? y Starting upgrade from unknown version to 6.12.1 ... Version 6.12.1 downloaded to themes/after-dark Stopping help server if running ... Generating help documentation ... Upgrade complete! Please see CHANGELOG.md for changes. Like Quick Install the upgrade script is written to POSIX standard will not require additional dependencies to operate on most systems. Upon upgrade the Release Hash will update as well so you may Validate Release.
